verses.verse: Why do the heathen <S%H1471><s%> rage <S%H7283><s%>, and the people <S%H3816><s%> imagine <S%H1897><s%> a vain thing <S%H7385><s%>?

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> set <S%H3320><s%> themselves <S%H7336><s%>, and the rulers take counsel <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and against his anointed <S%H4899><s%>, saying,
Let us break <S%H5423><s%> their bands <S%H4147><s%> asunder <S%H5423><s%>, and cast away <S%H7993><s%> their cords from us <S%H5688><s%>.
He that sits <S%H3427><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall laugh <S%H7832><s%>: the Lord <S%H136><s%> shall have them in derision <S%H3932><s%>.
Then shall he speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them in his wrath <S%H639><s%>, and trouble <S%H926><s%> them in his severe displeasure <S%H2740><s%>.
Yet have I set <S%H5258><s%> my king <S%H4428><s%> upon my holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
I will declare <S%H5608><s%> the decree <S%H2706><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, You are my Son; this day <S%H3117><s%> have I fathered you <S%H3205><s%>.

Ask <S%H7592><s%> of me <S%H5414><s%>, and I shall give you the heathen <S%H1471><s%> for your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and the outermost parts <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for your possession <S%H272><s%>.
You shall break <S%H7489><s%> them with a rod <S%H7626><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>; you shall dash them in pieces <S%H5310><s%> like a potter <S%H3335><s%>'s vessel <S%H3627><s%>.
Be wise <S%H7919><s%> now therefore <S%H4428><s%>, O you kings: be instructed <S%H3256><s%>, you judges <S%H8199><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with fear <S%H3374><s%>, and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> with trembling <S%H7461><s%>.

Kiss <S%H5401><s%> the Son <S%H1248><s%>, lest he be angry <S%H599><s%>, and you perish <S%H6><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%>, when his wrath <S%H639><s%> is kindled <S%H1197><s%> but a little <S%H4592><s%>. Blessed <S%H835><s%> are all they that put their trust in him <S%H2620><s%>.
